alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 7:01PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Rooks and southern Phillips Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 700 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kirwin to 8 miles north of Nicodemus. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stockton, Palco, Woodston and Damar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Kansas.
